name: Jewel Thief Girl
description:
*** Over 50% off for a limited time for one week***

* Jewel Thief Girl: Magic Match-3 Game

You will be the jewel thief girl to circumnavigate the globe. Think that sounds easy? Travel in the four countries and get ready for spectacular adventures. Use the unique chance to visit four continents and complete the inconceivable journey to win the fantastic jewel.

ENJOY THESE FEATURES:
- Adventure game with outstanding storyline, beautiful animation and challenging puzzles
- Extremely addictive gameplay with 81+ levels
- Careful iPhone adaptation of game levels
- High-quality colorful graphics and soundtrack
- Book a trip. It will be first class!
